fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e2.equipments.meter.mil

Class ElectricMeterElectricityModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.Model
      • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.AtomicModel
        • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.AtomicHIOA
          • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e2.equipments.meter.mil.ElectricMeterElectricityModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.interfaces.VariableDefinitionsAndSharingI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.interfaces.VariableInitialisationI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.interfaces.AtomicModelI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.interfaces.EventsExchangingI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.interfaces.ModelI, java.io.Serializable

    @ModelExternalEvents(exported={BatteriesRequiredPowerChanged.class,GeneratorRequiredPowerChanged.class})
 @ModelImportedVariable(name="currentHeaterIntensity",type=java.lang.Double.class) @ModelImportedVariable(name="currentHairDryerIntensity",type=java.lang.Double.class) @ModelImportedVariable(name="solarPanelOutputPower",type=java.lang.Double.class) @ModelImportedVariable(name="batteriesInputPower",type=java.lang.Double.class) @ModelImportedVariable(name="batteriesOutputPower",type=java.lang.Double.class) @ModelImportedVariable(name="generatorOutputPower",type=java.lang.Double.class)
 @ModelExportedVariable(name="batteriesRequiredPower",type=java.lang.Double.class) @ModelExportedVariable(name="generatorRequiredPower",type=java.lang.Double.class)
public class ElectricMeterElectricityModel
extends fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.AtomicHIOA
    The class ElectricMeterElectricityModel defines the simulation model for the electric meter electricity consumption.

    Description

    This model is an HIOA model that imports variables, hence shows how this kind of models are programmed.

    • Imported events: none
    • Exported events: none
    • Imported variables:
        name = currentHeaterIntensity, type = Double name = currentHairDryerIntensity, type = Double name = solarPanelOutputPower, type = Double name = batteriesInputPower, type = Double name = batteriesOutputPower, type = Double name = generatorOutputPower, type = Double
    • Exported variables:
        name = batteriesRequiredPower, type = Double name = generatorRequiredPower, type = Double

    Implementation Invariants

     invariant       STEP > 0.0
 invariant       evaluationStep.getSimulatedDuration() > 0.0
 invariant       solarPanelOutputPower == null || !solarPanelOutputPower.isInitialised() || solarPanelOutputPower.getValue() >= 0.0
 invariant       currentHeaterIntensity == null || !currentHeaterIntensity.isInitialised() || currentHeaterIntensity.getValue() >= 0.0
 invariant       currentHairDryerIntensity == null || !currentHairDryerIntensity.isInitialised() || currentHairDryerIntensity.getValue() >= 0.0
 invariant       currentIntensity != null && (!currentIntensity.isInitialised() || currentIntensity.getValue() >= 0.0)
 invariant       cumulativeConsumption != null && (!cumulativeConsumption.isInitialised() || cumulativeConsumption.getValue() >= 0.0)
 invariant       powerProduction != null && (!powerProduction.isInitialised() || powerProduction.getValue() >= 0.0)

    Invariants

     invariant       URI != null && !URI.isEmpty()

    Created on : 2023-10-02

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:

      • ElectricMeterElectricityModel

        public ElectricMeterElectricityModel(java.lang.String uri,
                                     java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit simulatedTimeUnit,
                                     fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.simulators.interfaces.AtomicSimulatorI simulationEngine)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        create an ElectricMeterElectricityModel instance. 
         pre     uri == null || !uri.isEmpty()
 pre     simulatedTimeUnit != null
 pre     simulationEngine != null && !simulationEngine.isModelSet()
 pre     simulationEngine instanceof AtomicEngine
 post    !isDebugModeOn()
 post    getURI() != null && !getURI().isEmpty()
 post    uri == null || getURI().equals(uri)
 post    getSimulatedTimeUnit().equals(simulatedTimeUnit)
 post    getSimulationEngine().equals(simulationEngine)
        Parameters:
        uri - URI of the model.
        simulatedTimeUnit - time unit used for the simulation time.
        simulationEngine - simulation engine to which the model is attached.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
